name: SpeedRun Frog
description:
* CRASH!!! *

Have you heard that?

There has been a toxic waste leak in the factory! You have to RUN, there is no time to lose.

Resume

The player's goal will be to get from a point "A" to a point '"B" in the shortest time possible.

To do this, the player must use the mechanics: vertical sliding, grabing, mobility in the air and both the normal jump and the wall Jump (being the star mechanic) and manage to avoid the traps and obstacles such as: “spikes”, “drops” and “empty spaces”.

Help?

You can help me by answering a couple of questions on this form, it won't take long I promise.
